reviews.text: There is a large stone covered area, like a large town square at the Town Hall. There are sidewalk cafes, many kinds of shops, and an information/visitors office where you can look for maps, tours, info, etc. At opposite end of square from Town Hall is a beautiful large cathedral.  Mozart and Handel played the large pipe organ there back in the day.
Very nice place, have been inside and its just as nice there as from the outside
No need to watch your wallet here
